ARABIC: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ نُّزُلًا أَمْ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Is that better by way of hospitality or the tree of Zaqqum
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Is this better or the tree of Zaqqum
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Is this a better hospitality or the tree of al-Zaqqum?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Is this not a better reward than the tree of Zaqqum
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So is this welcome better, or the tree of Zaqqum?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Is that (Paradise) better entertainment or the tree of Zaqqum
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Is this better as an entertainment or the tree of Zaqqum?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Is that better as a hospitality, or the Tree of Ez-Zakkoum?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Is this better as a welcome, or the tree of Zaqqum?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Is that better by way of hospitality or the Zaqqum tree,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Is this better as an entertainment or the tree of Zaqqum?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Is this a better reception, or the Zaqqum tree?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Is that the better entertainment or the Tree of Zaqqum?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Is that (Paradise) better entertainment or the tree of Zaqqum (a horrible tree in Hell)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Is this a better hospitality or the tree of AzZakkum!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Is this a better hospitality, or the Tree of Bitterness?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Is Paradise a better accommodation or the tree of zaqqum?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:62] Is that, which is mentioned to them, a better hospitality (nuzul, denotes what is prepared for one who is being received as a guest and so forth) or the Zaqqūm tree, that is prepared for the inhabitants of the Fire — it is the vilest and most bitter tree of the Tihāma region, which God causes to grow in the Fire, as will be stated shortly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Is this) which I have mentioned for the inhabitants of Paradise of food and drink (better as a welcome) better as food, drink and reward for the believers, (or the tree of Zaqqum) for Abu Jahl and his host?
